title: support for double-byte characters?
description:
now lucene does not support for double-byte characters, such as simplifed-
chinese. how about adding this support?

comments.content:
This can be done.  Check out some of the Analyzers in Lucene Sandbox.  That
should let you analyze, index, and search double-byte characters.  If you have a
new Analyzer to contribute, please add it to Bugzilla.
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
